vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.26;
son of: Jeroham (H3395H);
brother of: Shehariah (H7841), Athaliah (H6271H), Jaareshiah (H3298), Elijah (H0452H) and Zichri (H2147J)
§ Shamsherai = "sunlike"
a Benjamite, son of Jeroham
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Jeroham; jefe de familia; tribu de Benjamín
